example: It's a joke, because it is laughable .
example_meaning: Đây là một trò đùa, bởi vì nó rất nực cười .
definition: Fitted to excite laughter; as, a laughable story; a laughable scene.

example: Disobedience to civil authority a “duty”?
example_meaning: Không tuân lệnh quyền lực dân sự, phải chăng đó là một nghĩa vụ?
definition: Not obedient.

example: I'd start blabbing .
example_meaning: Tôi sẽ chém gió .
definition: To tell tales; to gossip without reserve or discretion.

example: What type of tarantula do you have?
example_meaning: Bạn đang có loại nhện đen nào?
definition: A species of wolf spider, Lycosa tarentula.

example: Don't exaggerate .
example_meaning: Đừng phóng đại .
definition: That has been described as greater than it actually is; abnormally increased or enlarged.

example: The technical term is narcissism .
example_meaning: Thuật ngữ gọi đó là sự tự đại .
definition: Excessive love of oneself.

example: Genuine warmth can no more be simulated than can enthusiasm.
example_meaning: Sự nhiệt thành chân thật cũng như sự hăng hái không thể nào giả vờ được.
definition: Simple past tense and past participle of simulate.

example: You can find the publisher ID by clicking Settings in the sidebar .
example_meaning: Bạn có thể tìm thấy ID nhà xuất bản bằng cách nhấp vào Cài đặt trong thanh bên .
definition: a short news story printed alongside a larger one

example: Tactfully take the initiative to help those who grieve
example_meaning: Hãy tự động giúp đỡ một cách tế nhị những người đang đau buồn
definition: In a tactful manner.

example: Quite the contrary; it is the vehicle of savage, destructive nihilism ."]
example_meaning: Ngược lại; nó là công cụ càn quét, chủ nghĩa hư vô phá hoại."]
definition: (philosophy) Extreme skepticism, maintaining that nothing has a real existence.

example: Well, I think it's a downright deceitful way of acting.
example_meaning: Tôi nghĩ đó là một cách cư xử hết sức dối trá .
definition: deliberately misleading or cheating

example: "Brazilian amputee model dead at 20".
example_meaning: Truy cập ngày 24 tháng 1 năm 2009 . ^ “Brazilian amputee model dead at 20”.
definition: A person who has had one or more limbs removed.

example: " Promissory Note ".
example_meaning: Cậu nghĩ tôi đang lừa gạt à?
definition: Containing or consisting of a promise.

example: Just certainly broken granule pot ask exactly.
example_meaning: Chỉ cần chắc chắn bị hỏng hạt nồi hỏi chính xác.
definition: to segment into tiny grains or particles

example: More confection .
example_meaning: Pha chế thêm nào.
definition: A food item prepared very sweet, frequently decorated in fine detail, and often preserved with sugar, such as a candy, sweetmeat, fruit preserve, pastry, cake or the like.

example: Using a microphone during a demonstration requires special forethought .
example_meaning: Việc sử dụng micrô trong phần trình diễn đòi hỏi phải đặc biệt suy tính trước .
definition: Anticipation.

example: His son wants to be a lawyer .
example_meaning: Con trai ông ấy muốn trở thành luật sư .
definition: A professional person qualified (as by a law degree and/or bar exam) and authorized to practice law, i.e. conduct lawsuits and/or give legal advice.

example: We're meeting with counsel to perfect the rest of the testimony .
example_meaning: Ta sẽ gặp luật sư để hoàn chỉnh lời khai .
definition: statements made by a witness in court.

example: She comes back to the States, drops the lawsuit , moves in with her father.
example_meaning: Cô ta quay lại Mĩ, bỏ qua việc kiện cáo quay lại với ông bố.
definition: (law) In civil law, a case where two or more people disagree and one or more of the parties take the case to a court for resolution.

example: The process of the civil law will work its way.
example_meaning: Tiến trình của luật dân sự sẽ là cách thức như vậy.
definition: (law) Roman law based on theCorpus Juris Civilis; it contrasts with common law.

example: The prosecutor’s cross - examination continued for several days.
example_meaning: Công tố viên đã thực hiện cuộc thẩm vấn trong nhiều ngày liên tiếp.
definition: (law) The interrogating or questioning of a witness by the party against whom he or she has been called and examined. See examination.

example: I have no choice but to recuse myself.
example_meaning: Anh không còn cách nào khác để cứu chính mình.
definition: (transitive) To refuse or reject (a judge); to challenge that the judge shall not try the case or is disqualified to act.

example: Now, there' s a man here to interview as your adjudant
example_meaning: Còn nữa, ứng cử viên cho chức trợ lý đang chờ
definition: The act of adjudicating, of reaching a judgement.

example: His "Proclamacio ... ex parte ...
example_meaning: Không thề tên của hình tượng — Ex .
definition: (law) Of, relating to, or characteristic of a proceeding where one of the involved parties is not present.

example: "Gilyak" is the Manchu appellation .
example_meaning: 'Gilyak' là tên gọi Mãn Châu.
definition: (law) of or relating to appeals

example: That is to say, the burden of proof is on the person with a novel claim.
example_meaning: Tức là, nghĩa vụ chứng minh thuộc về người có tuyên bố mới.
definition: (law) The duty of a party in a legal proceeding to prove an assertion of fact; it includes both the burden of production and the burden of persuasion; the onus probandi

example: A union can be registered through a public deed before a notary or a judge.
example_meaning: Hôn nhân có thể được đăng ký thông qua chứng thư công khai trước một công chứng viên hoặc thẩm phán.
definition: an officer who can administer oaths and statutory declarations, witness and authenticate documents and perform certain other acts varying from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.

example: Eminent domain .
example_meaning: Quyền trưng mua .
definition: (US) The right of a government over the lands within its jurisdiction. Usually invoked to compel land owners to sell their property in preparation for a major construction project such as a freeway.

example: Let Tom buy a new computer if he wants to.
example_meaning: Nếu Tom muốn thì mua cho anh ta máy tính mới đi.
definition: (computing) A programmable device that performs mathematical calculations and logical operations, especially one that can process, store and retrieve large amounts of data very quickly.

example: We desegregated our schools.
example_meaning: Chúng ta xóa bỏ phân biệt chủng tộc ở trường học.
definition: The act or process of eliminating segregation.

example: I don't need a simulacrum of an emotionally ruined man.
example_meaning: Tôi không cần vật thế thân cho một con người bị hủy hoại về mặt cảm xúc.
definition: An image or representation.

example: May their life together be like this dance, harmonious , smooth.
example_meaning: Cầu cho cuộc sống chung của họ giống như điệu nhảy này, du dương , êm ái.
definition: Showing accord in feeling or action.

example: When he was 14, he began studying Marxism .
example_meaning: Khi lên 14 tuổi, ông bắt đầu học về chủ nghĩa Mác .
definition: The socialist philosophy and political program developed by Karl Marx and Frederick Engels.

example: Don't jinx me.
example_meaning: Đừng trù ẻo tôi.
definition: A hex; an evil spell.

example: Ceso, when will you stop with those superstitions ?
example_meaning: Ceso, chứng nào ông sẽ hết mê tín dị đoan vậy?
definition: A belief, not based on human reason or scientific knowledge, that future events may be influenced by one's behaviour in some magical or mystical way.

example: Just swab it on the inside of your mouth.
example_meaning: Hãy thông nó vào miệng anh.
definition: (medicine) a small piece of soft, absorbent material, such as gauze, used to clean wounds, apply medicine, or take samples of body fluids. Often attached to a stick or wire to aid access.

example: For a minute at the saloon , I thought you were gonna draw.
example_meaning: Trong một tích tắc hồi còn trong quán rượu , tôi tưởng anh đã sắp rút súng bắn tôi.
definition: (US) A tavern, especially in an American Old West setting.

example: Unless they legalized bigamy overnight.
example_meaning: Trừ khi song hôn đã trở thành hợp pháp.
definition: (ecclesiastical) A second marriage
